channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Katy Perry, Gayle King to fly to space on Blue Origin’s all-women flight
item.description: Jeff Bezos’ fiancée Lauren Sánchez will also be aboard.

item.title: Federal jobs have gone from reliable to risky. It happened overnight.
Democrat proposes MEME Act to stop Trump and other top politicians from issuing crypto coins
item.description: The new bill follows presidential forays into memecoins from Donald Trump, the president of the Central African Republic, and Argentina.

item.title: Consumer discretionary stocks are falling deeper into a correction
YouTube star MrBeast is raising money at a $5 billion valuation
item.description: Jimmy Donaldson's businesses reportedly generated more than $400 million in revenue last year.

item.title: Very few stocks — Nvidia and Palantir are two — outpacing Rolls-Royce since 2023
Goldman Sachs erases diversity goals and scrubs pages about gender and racial equality from its website after Trump’s DEI order
item.description: "We strongly believe that merit and diversity are not mutually exclusive," CEO David Solomon said.

item.title: Nvidia is biggest chip player. But it also leads by this other metric.
Moderna’s stock stumbles as funding for bird-flu vaccine may be in peril
Stripe hits a $91 billion valuation but shows no signs it’s interested in going public because it can’t be managed ‘on a super tight quarterly EPS basis,’ cofounder says
item.description: The privately held Stripe has long shrugged off requests to go public.
